posts.title: HP Pavilion Wave Speaker Shaped PC
posts.content: Give your workstation/home entertainment system a facelift with the HP Pavilion Wave speaker shaped PC. This fully-functional computer provides excellent sound along with features like 4K output, a built-in mic, USB ports, Bluetooth, and Gigabit Ethernet.

posts.title: Extendable GoPro Pole
posts.content: Get incredible shots of the world around you by taking pictures using this extendable GoPro pole. This sturdy pole extends up to an incredible 40 inches, comes with a handy strap for mounting the remote, and can retract to a compact package for easy transportation.

posts.title: USPS Planetary Stamps
posts.content: Marvel at the beauty of our planetary neighbors every time you send out some snail-mail by using these USPS planetary stamps. The pane comes with 16 full color stamps with visually compelling images of nearby planets captured by our unmanned spacecraft.

posts.title: Skull Shot Glasses
posts.content: Real men fight bears, arm wrestle lions, and drink exclusively from skull shot glasses that are lit on fire. Now you too can own yourself some skull shaped shot glasses and finally be able to say you’re own your way to becoming a real man.

posts.title: Crime Scene Bandages
posts.content: No matter how grave or gruesome the ouchie, the crime scene bandages will help keep unwanted bacteria away from the wound. Though something terrible has taken place, tell those nasty germs to move it along, there’s nothing to see here.

posts.title: Pocket Beer Book
posts.content: Become a world-renowned beer connoisseur with the pocket beer book by your side. From the cutting-edge brews of the U.S. to the timeless stout beers of Europe, this helpful book teaches you everything you need or want to know about your favorite liquid.

posts.title: Mustache Hangers
posts.content: What better way to keep all your vintage hipster garments organized and well groomed than with the mustache hangers. Each hanger is made of heavy duty nickel plated metal and shaped like a burly mustache so you can show family and friends how hip you are.

posts.title: Superhero Napkins
posts.content: Make mealtime fun for the little ones while keeping their clothes clean with these superhero napkins. Each two-ply napkin is styled like the uniform of some of the most iconic heroes in DC universe like Wonder Woman, Superman, and Batman.

posts.title: Classic Arcade Game Art Book
posts.content: Relive your glorious arcade days by turning through the pages of Artcade – the classic arcade game art book. Classic game marquees like Street Fighter II, Battle Zone, and Out Run are displayed on fully colored double-page spreads.

posts.title: One Handed Beer Bottle Opener
posts.content: Enjoy an imported cold brew without ruining the cap for your collection by popping it open using the one handed beer bottle opener. The sturdy design caters perfectly for ambidextrous use and features a handy built-in magnet that keeps the cap from falling.

posts.title: Neon Pencils
posts.content: Pump a little life and color into your doodles with these neon pencils. These super bright coloring pencils come encased in a sleek black frame designed to contrast the neon colors on the inside, and work great for creating day-glow masterpieces – or just for highlighting.

posts.title: Drive Thru Placemat With Crayons
posts.content: Keep the kids from driving you crazy during your next outing by entertaining them using the drive thru placemat with crayons. Using car shaped crayons, they’ll be able to color for hours on end – making it ideal for restaurants and long road trips.
